sections.heading: Commissioner; adopt rules and regulations
sections.text: The Tax Commissioner shall adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out the collection of lodging taxes under the Nebraska Visitors Development Act.SourceLaws 1980, LB 499, ยง 18;Laws 1988, LB 797, ยง 9;R.S.1943, (2008), ยง 81-1262;Laws 2012, LB1053,
